item.title: Rust project structure step by step
item.description: Introduction The recent, hopefully temporal, death of Actix-web forced me to recheck some code of a pet project of mine that was not cleanly decoupled, some of my Diesel was mixed with my Actix, so I will share the process and stages of decomposition in Rust.
